system.description:
Beginning at 6th level, you’ve either acquired or made a special covert spy gadget. This spy gadget often takes the form of a watch or wrist @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.WJ2Y1MmlR5XJDzft]{Personal Communicator}, but can be your choice of any innocuous object or piece of apparel that you wear or carry on your person. While not in use your spy gadget has the benefits of a Concealed Weapon augment. When you first gain your spy gadget, choose 3 of the following items and weapons:

Your spy gadget can be used as the chosen items or weapons. If one of your chosen items has a set number of uses, lost uses can be restored at the cost of the item over the course of a long rest.

Whenever you gain a scout level you may choose an additional item for your spy gadget. Whenever you choose a new item in this way, you may either create a new separate spy gadget or add the newly chosen item to an existing spy gadget.

If your spy gadget is lost or destroyed, you can make or acquire a new one over the course of a long rest by spending an amount of credits equal to cost
of the item.
